attributes.action: Change the legal age of driving to 16 years of age
attributes.additional_details: Change the legal driving age to 16 years of age and have your provisional license at 15
attributes.background: I believe 16 year olds should be trusted to drive a vehicle.They are Allowed the provisional Licence at 16 ,so i think they should have a full time driving licence.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for the same action:

Change the age to get a full car drivers licence to 16 years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643332

Lower The Legal Driving Age To 16
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640201
